Kenneth Browne bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe osise na-arụ ọrụ na Brooklyn
A mụrụ ya na Hempstead, New York ma bírí ọtụtụ afọ na Snow Hill, Maryland tupu ọ laghachi New York City iji chụsoo Master Degree ya.
Browne gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Salisbury na 2005 na Bachelor of Science na Biology na Bachelor of Arts na Studio Art.  N'afọ 2007, ọ gụsịrị nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na Pratt Institute na Brooklyn
Ọrụ ya n'ụbọchị bụ dị ka ónyé ndụmọdụ nnabata na Pratt Institute.
Kenneth Browne egosila n'ọtụtụ ébé na United States ma sonye n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ndị juried
Ọrụ ya abụwo ihe ngosi na ébé nrụọrụ weebụ n'ịntanetị nke Saatchi Gallery, na Brooklyn Art Studios, ọkachasị Yashar Galleries.  O gosikwara na Reeves Gallery na Chelsea, Manhattan.
A kpọrọ Browne ka ọ sonye na 2008 Biennial: Contemporary American Realism na Fort Wayne Museum of Art.  O merìrì "nke kachasị mma na ngosi" na Figurative Expo 2011 nké Infinity Art Gallery.
